name: After the Holidays Ham Bone Soup
author: uscjessie
summary: A leftover ham bone is simmered with vegetables, macaroni, and rice to create a hearty soup and family tradition after the holidays.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with juice
1 (14 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
¾ cup uncooked long grain rice
1 cup chopped cooked ham, or amount leftover
directions: Place the ham bone into a large pot and fill with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil and cook for 15 minutes
Add the onion and tomatoes, then stir in the frozen mixed vegetables and potatoes
Simmer for about 20 minutes, then add the macaroni, rice, and chopped ham
Cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 1 1/2 hours
Any ham on the bone should come off easily
Stir in the tomato sauce and let cool for about 15 minutes before serving
